dict.acceptation: 其后，随后，接着；“subsequent”的派生；嗣后；尔后；

sent.orig: Other Hong Kong entrepreneurs subsequently branched into newer industries, such as machinery, electronics and professional services.
sent.trans: 其他香港企业家随后分别涉足机械、电子和专业服务等新兴行业。

sent.orig: She was subsequently to miss him greatly, and was desperately sorry to see him go.
sent.trans: 她很怀念他，并对他的离去甚感遗憾。

sent.orig: We shall subsequently obtain some interesting results on global extrema.
sent.trans: 我们将不断地得出关于整体极值的某些有用的结果。

sent.orig: Subsequently, the Securities and Futures Commission of Jilin Authority to investigate complaints.
sent.trans: 随后，证监会吉林监管局对投诉事项展开调查。

sent.orig: Chris's father subsequently became a medical missionary in India.
sent.trans: 克里斯的父亲后来成为印度的一名传教医生。
